page.title: 14 Our favourite things
page.content: Favourite Books. The most popular type of book was fairy stories.Namely:- The three billy goats gruff,Hansel and Gretel,Sleeping Beauty. Second most favourite was fantasy.Namely:-James and the Giant Peach,Stig of the dump, The Wizard of Oz. Favourite indoor games. Monopoly, Snakes and Ladders,Connect 4. Favourite foods Our class liked chips. Chips with sausages,Chips withe chicken, chips with fish fingers,and chips with beefburgers. Our favourite sweet was ice cream. Our favourite television programme was The 'A'team.
